lead_paragraph: PASADENA, Calif. - It has been a trying season for Ohio State quarterback Terrelle Pryor.
snippet: In what has sometimes been a trying season for Ohio State's Terrelle Pryor, he has periodically received counsel from LeBron James.
abstract: In what has sometimes been a trying season for Ohio State's Terrelle Pryor, he has periodically received counsel from LeBron James.
